name: insomnia-plugin-request-body-prompts
description: Prompt users for variables in your Insomnia request body (e.g. <<prompt:Question:default>>) before sending. Supports default values, and cancels on dialog abort.

insomnia.name: request-body-prompts
insomnia.description: Prompt for variables in the request body using <<prompt:Your question[:default value]>> before sending a request.

author: Christian Ego <Christian.Ego@aracom.de>
